ch.grengine.load

Class BytecodeClassLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.ClassLoader
      • ch.grengine.load.SourceClassLoader
        • ch.grengine.load.BytecodeClassLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable

    public class BytecodeClassLoader
extends SourceClassLoader
    Bytecode-based class loader that also implements the SourceClassLoader interface.

    Loads classes based on given bytecode or from the parent class loader. Depending on the given load mode, the parent class loader is searched first or last.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Alain Stalder, Made in Switzerland.

        public Class<?> loadMainClass(Source source)
        Description copied from class: SourceClassLoader
        loads the main class of the given source.

      • loadClass

        public Class<?> loadClass(Source source,
                          String name)
        Description copied from class: SourceClassLoader
        loads a class with the given name and from the given source.

        First searches for the source, only then for the class with given name as part of the classes that resulted from compiling the source.

        Specified by:

      • releaseClasses

        public void releaseClasses(ClassReleaser releaser)
        Description copied from class: SourceClassLoader
        release metadata for all classed ever loaded by this class loader.

        Allows to remove metadata associated by Groovy (or Java) with a class, which is often necessary to get on-the-fly garbage collection.

        Generally call only when really done using this class loader and all loaded classes; subsequently trying to use this class loader or its classes results generally in undefined behavior.

        Specified by:
        releaseClasses in class SourceClassLoader
        Parameters:
        releaser - class releaser

        Returns:

        Since:
